cd F:\Python\practice\web_sample\my-app
git stash push -u -m "temp-stash" && \
git pull origin master --rebase && \
git stash pop && \
git add -A && \
git commit -m "ğŸ’¾ Auto-commit after rebase" || echo "No changes to commit" && \
git push origin master || echo "Push failed"

git rm scripts/fetchLineupsFootballData.mts

# æ–°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«è¿½åŠ 
git add scripts/fetchLineups.mts

# ã‚³ãƒŸãƒƒãƒˆ
git commit -m "âœ… Rename fetchLineupsFootballData.mts to fetchLineups.mts"

# æœ€æ–°ã® master ã‚’å–ã‚Šè¾¼ã¿ã¤ã¤ãƒªãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ï¼ˆå¿…è¦ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ï¼‰
git pull origin master --rebase

# ãƒ—ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥
git push origin master
